com.nerjal.json.parser.options

Class CommentParseOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nerjal.json.parser.options.CommentParseOptions

  • public class CommentParseOptions
extends Object

    Stringification options for JsonComment elements.

    Allows to set whether should the comment be a block comment, as well as whether should new lines be indented, and/or if they should be preceded by an asterisk, for block comments.

    Hence only two types of stringification options are available: inline comments, which don't require any further elements, and block comments, which uses the two said properties.

    Author:
    Nerjal Nosk

      Different available stringification types for JsonComment

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentParseOptions()
      Instantiates new in-line comment stringification options.
      By default, usage of indent and asterisks on new lines for block comments are set to true.
      CommentParseOptions(boolean indent, boolean newlineasterisk, CommentParseOptions.CommentType type)
      Instantiates new comment stringification options for the specified type, usage of indent and asterisks on new lines.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentParseOptions

        public CommentParseOptions(boolean indent,
                           boolean newlineasterisk,
                           CommentParseOptions.CommentType type)
        Instantiates new comment stringification options for the specified type, usage of indent and asterisks on new lines.
        Parameters:
        indent - whether stringification of a block comment should indent new lines to the same level as stringification
        newlineasterisk - whether stringification of a block comment should add an asterisk at the beginning of all new line
        type - the type of comment these options should stringify

      • CommentParseOptions

        public CommentParseOptions()
        Instantiates new in-line comment stringification options.
        By default, usage of indent and asterisks on new lines for block comments are set to true.
